title: AG60101: Watershed Management - Quick Facts
text:
AG60101
Course name | Watershed Management
Offered by | Agricultural & Food Engineering
Credits | 4
L-T-P | 3-1-0
Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Definitions: watershed, watershed classification, watershed delineation, Watershed resources inventory and identification of problems People participation in watershed management, National programmes on watershed management Quantification of watershed response (runoff and sediment yield), instrumentation and methods for measurement of sediment, estimation of sediment loss, watershed prioritization Soil conservation measures biological and Mechanical measures, gully control structures, earthen dam, water harvesting structures, river training structures and gabians Planning and operation of watershed management projects Watershed models
